name_localized.en: The Patron Double Room, 1 Double Bed
name_localized.es: The Patron Double Room, 1 Double Bed

short_description_localized.en: The Patron Double Room, 1 Double Bed
short_description_localized.es: The Patron Double Room, 1 Double Bed

description_localized.en:
1 Double Bed
247-sq-foot (23-sq-meter) room with city views

Internet - Free WiFi
Entertainment - Flat-screen TV with premium channels
Sleep - Premium bedding
Bathroom - Private bathroom, shower, designer toiletries, and a hair dryer (on request)
Practical - Iron/ironing board and desk
Comfort - Air conditioning and daily housekeeping
Need to Know - No cribs (infant beds) or rollaway/extra beds available
Non-Smoking
Connecting/adjoining rooms can be requested, subject to availability
